headline.main: WAR FILMS FACE BOYCOTT THREAT; 35 Movie Theatres in Jersey City Receive Letters From America First Leader NYE SPEECH IS ENCLOSED Hudson County Group Says It Plans to List 'Propaganda Pictures' and Theatres

lead_paragraph: C.C. Moskowitz, vice president of Loew's, Inc., confirmed a report yesterday that Loew moving picture theatres in Jersey City had been threatened with a boycott by the Hudson County chapter of the America First Committee if they did not stop showing alleged pro-war propaganda movies and newsreels.
abstract: 35 N J theatres reveal lr from America First Com threatening boycott if alleged pro-war propaganda movies continue to be shown
